sentences: Ma oleksin eile tulnud, kui poleksin olnud nii väsinud.
Kes teaks, ma oleksin homme rongiga läinud!
Ta oleksin ilmselt võitnud, kui poleks saanud vigastada.
context: 'Oleksin' is the first-person singular conditional form of the Estonian verb 'olema', which means 'to be'. It is used to express hypothetical situations, possibilities, or conditions in the present or past. In English, it corresponds to 'I would be' or 'I would have been' depending on the context and tense.
